content:
IWorkflowInstanceManagement Interface

Definition

Represents a service contract that defines a set of operations that allow you to control workflow instances.

In this Article

[System.ServiceModel.Activities.Description.WorkflowContractBehavior]
[System.ServiceModel.ServiceContract(Name="IWorkflowInstanceManagement", Namespace="http://schemas.datacontract.org/2008/10/WorkflowServices")]
public interface IWorkflowInstanceManagement

Methods

Abandon(Guid,String)

Attempts to abandon the specified workflow instance.

public void Abandon (Guid instanceId, string reason);
instanceId
Guid

The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to abandon.

reason
String

The reason for abandoning the workflow instance.

Remarks

This operation is only valid for a workflow instance that is currently loaded in memory. If the specified workflow instance is not loaded or has completed, this operation is a no-op. This operation is not transaction aware.

BeginAbandon(Guid,String,AsyncCallback,Object)

Begins an asynchronous operation to abandon the specified workflow instance.

public IAsyncResult BeginAbandon (Guid instanceId, string reason, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
instanceId
Guid

The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to abandon.

reason
String

The reason for abandoning the workflow instance.

callback
AsyncCallback

The asynchronous callback delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation completion.

state
Object

An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous abandon operation.

Returns
IAsyncResult

The IAsyncResult.

Remarks

The abandon process terminates the workflow instance, destroys all the associated objects, and releases the associated resources.

BeginCancel(Guid,AsyncCallback,Object)

Begins an asynchronous operation to cancel the specified workflow instance.

public IAsyncResult BeginCancel (Guid instanceId, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
instanceId
Guid

The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to cancel.

callback
AsyncCallback

The asynchronous callback delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation completion.

state
Object

An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous cancel operation.

Returns
IAsyncResult

An IAsyncResult.

Remarks

The cancel process quits a workflow instance and returns to the previous state without saving any changes that the workflow may have made.

BeginRun(Guid,AsyncCallback,Object)

Begins an asynchronous operation to run the specified workflow instance.

public IAsyncResult BeginRun (Guid instanceId, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
instanceId
Guid

The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to run.

callback
AsyncCallback

The asynchronous callback delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation completion.

state
Object

An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous run operation.

Returns
IAsyncResult

An IAsyncResult.

BeginSuspend(Guid,String,AsyncCallback,Object)

Begins an asynchronous operation to suspend the specified workflow instance.

public IAsyncResult BeginSuspend (Guid instanceId, string reason, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
instanceId
Guid

The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to suspend.

reason
String

The reason to suspend the workflow instance.

callback
AsyncCallback

The asynchronous callback delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation completion.

state
Object

An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous suspend operation.

Returns
IAsyncResult

The IAsyncResult.

Remarks

The suspend process temporarily halts a workflow instance.

BeginTerminate(Guid,String,AsyncCallback,Object)

Begins an asynchronous operation to terminate the specified workflow instance.

public IAsyncResult BeginTerminate (Guid instanceId, string reason, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
instanceId
Guid

The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to terminate.

reason
String

The reason to terminate the workflow instance.

callback
AsyncCallback

The asynchronous callback delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation completion.

state
Object

An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous terminate operation.

Returns
IAsyncResult

The IAsyncResult.

Remarks

The terminate process brings a workflow instance to an end.

BeginTransactedCancel(Guid,AsyncCallback,Object)

Begins an asynchronous cancel operation in a transaction.

public IAsyncResult BeginTransactedCancel (Guid instanceId, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
instanceId
Guid

The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to cancel.

callback
AsyncCallback

The asynchronous callback delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation completion.

state
Object

An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous cancel operation.

Returns
IAsyncResult

The IAsyncResult.

Remarks

The cancel process quits a workflow instance and returns to the previous state without saving any changes that the workflow may have made.

BeginTransactedRun(Guid,AsyncCallback,Object)

Begins an asynchronous operation that runs a workflow instance within a transaction.

public IAsyncResult BeginTransactedRun (Guid instanceId, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
instanceId
Guid

The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to run.

callback
AsyncCallback

The asynchronous callback delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation completion.

state
Object

An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous run operation.

Returns
IAsyncResult

The IAsyncResult.

Begins an asynchronous operation that suspends the specified workflow instance.

Guid

The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to suspend.

reason
String

The reason to suspend the workflow instance.

callback
AsyncCallback

The asynchronous callback delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation completion.

state
Object

An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous suspend operation.

Returns
IAsyncResult

The IAsyncResult.

Remarks

The suspend process temporarily halts a workflow instance.

BeginTransactedTerminate(Guid,String,AsyncCallback,Object)

Begins an asynchronous operation that terminates a workflow instance within a transaction.

public IAsyncResult BeginTransactedTerminate (Guid instanceId, string reason, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
instanceId
Guid

The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to terminate.

reason
String

The reason to terminate the workflow instance.

callback
AsyncCallback

The asynchronous callback delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation completion.

state
Object

An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous terminate operation.

IAsyncResult

The IAsyncResult.

Remarks

The terminate process brings a workflow instance to an end.

BeginTransactedUnsuspend(Guid,AsyncCallback,Object)

Begins an asynchronous operation that resumes the specified workflow instance within a transaction.

public IAsyncResult BeginTransactedUnsuspend (Guid instanceId, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
instanceId
Guid

The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to unsuspend.

callback
AsyncCallback

The asynchronous callback delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation completion.

state
Object

An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous unsuspend operation.

Returns
IAsyncResult

The IAsyncResult.

Remarks

The unsuspend process resumes a temporarily halted workflow instance.

BeginUnsuspend(Guid,AsyncCallback,Object)

Begins an asynchronous operation that resumes the specified workflow instance.

public IAsyncResult BeginUnsuspend (Guid instanceId, AsyncCallback callback, object state);
instanceId
Guid

The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to resume.

callback
AsyncCallback

The asynchronous callback delegate that receives the notification of the asynchronous operation completion.

state
Object

An object, specified by the application, that contains state information associated with the asynchronous unsuspend operation.

Returns
IAsyncResult

The IAsyncResult.

Remarks

The unsuspend process resumes a temporarily halted workflow instance.

Cancel(Guid)

Cancels the specified workflow instance.

public void Cancel (Guid instanceId);
instanceId
Guid

The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to cancel.

Remarks

If the instance identified by the instance ID does not exist in-memory, an attempt is made to load the instance from the instance store (if persistence has been enabled). If persistence has not been enabled or the instance was not persisted a fault is returned to the caller. Once the in-memory instance has been loaded or identified, this operation cancels the workflow instance.

Completes an asynchronous abandon operation.

public void EndAbandon (IAsyncResult result);
result
IAsyncResult

The IAsyncResult returned by a call to the stem.ServiceModel.Activities.IWorkflowInstanceManagement.BeginAbandon* method.

Remarks

The cancel process quits a workflow instance and returns to the previous state without saving any changes that the workflow may have made.

Run(Guid)

Starts executing the specified workflow instance.

public void Run (Guid instanceId);
instanceId
Guid

The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to run.

Suspend(Guid,String)

Suspends the specified workflow instance.

public void Suspend (Guid instanceId, string reason);
instanceId
Guid

The workflow instance to suspend.

reason
String

The reason for suspending the workflow instance.

Remarks

The suspend process temporarily halts a workflow instance.

Terminate(Guid,String)

Terminates the specified workflow instance.

public void Terminate (Guid instanceId, string reason);
instanceId
Guid

The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to terminate.

reason
String

The reason to terminate the workflow instance.

Remarks

This operation combines the functionality of an abort operation followed by a persist operation.

TransactedCancel(Guid)

Cancels the specified workflow instance within a transaction.

public void TransactedCancel (Guid instanceId);
instanceId
Guid

The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to cancel.

TransactedRun(Guid)

Runs the specified workflow instance within a transaction.

public void TransactedRun (Guid instanceId);
instanceId
Guid

The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to run.

TransactedSuspend(Guid,String)

Suspends the specified workflow instance within a transaction.

public void TransactedSuspend (Guid instanceId, string reason);
instanceId
Guid

The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to suspend.

reason
String

The reason the workflow instance is suspended.

Remarks

The suspend process temporarily halts a workflow instance.

TransactedTerminate(Guid,String)

Terminates the specified workflow instance within a transaction.

public void TransactedTerminate (Guid instanceId, string reason);
instanceId
Guid

The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to terminate.

reason
String

The reason to terminate the workflow instance.

Remarks

The terminate process brings a workflow instance to an end.

TransactedUnsuspend(Guid)

Resumes the specified workflow instance within a transaction.

public void TransactedUnsuspend (Guid instanceId);
instanceId
Guid

The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to resume.

Remarks

The unsuspend process resumes a temporarily halted workflow instance.

Unsuspend(Guid)

Resumes the specified workflow instance.

public void Unsuspend (Guid instanceId);
instanceId
Guid

The GUID identifier of the workflow instance to resume.
